subject: Baseplate including heelplate
description_text:
Hi, I'm planning on ordering the Simsonn Pro X pedals with the Baseplate -
Does the baseplate come with the heel rest as well?

Thank you & Have a nice summer!

-- 
Med vänliga hälsningar

SAM SWIRE
Designer & Architectural Engineer

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Swire,    Yes, the Baseplate purchased separately includes the Heel Plate.
